comments.author: babymethyl2013
comments.body: Already dominated by FPGAs. this was only good money when it was cryptonight(ASICs) for a month and a half. The antminer X3 was earning 5.00$ a day on here for a while.

comments.author: scryptr
comments.created_time: February 25, 2023, 07:48:08 PMLast edit: August 06, 2023, 03:02:39 PM by scryptr
comments.body: Quote from: babymethyl2013 on December 10, 2022, 01:59:32 AMAlready dominated by FPGAs. this was only good money when it was cryptonight(ASICs) for a month and a half. The antminer X3 was earning 5.00$ a day on here for a while. DYNEXSOLVE IS THE ONLY CURRENT MINER FOR DYNEX COIN (DNX)--There may be a coin in the past that you are confusing with Dynex Coin (DNX).  The DNX coin is in no way based on a cryptonight algorithm.       --scryptrEDIT: Apparently, DynexCoin (Dynex, DNX) had cryptonote origins.  The coin and blockchain were repurposed and relaunched.       --scryptr

comments.author: babymethyl2013
comments.created_time: February 26, 2023, 03:04:10 PMLast edit: February 26, 2023, 03:15:12 PM by babymethyl2013
comments.body: Quote from: scryptr on February 25, 2023, 07:48:08 PMQuote from: babymethyl2013 on December 10, 2022, 01:59:32 AMAlready dominated by FPGAs. this was only good money when it was cryptonight(ASICs) for a month and a half. The antminer X3 was earning 5.00$ a day on here for a while. DYNEXSOLVE IS THE ONLY CURRENT MINER FOR DYNEX COIN (DNX)--There may be a coin in the past that you are confusing with Dynex Coin (DNX).  The DNX coin is in no way based on a cryptonight algorithm.       --scryptrNot true. They were cryptonight original(yes asic mined on the X3) for like 1.5 months. people made bank and left. I still have a nice bag if it ever scam pumps on some binance listing for "ItS AbOuT TeH Ai BrO" as that seems to be the direction POW will (have to)  take.Can someone please make another cryptonight coin? There were bankrupt miners in Porto Ricco selling them for 20$ with shipping last year. If you were lucky you scooped up an entire X3 mining farm for next to nothing. The speculation paid off.the first day of mining one x3 made me 6.4k coins per day. For a while my paltry 4.5- 5 MH was one of the highest hashrates. it quickly got jumped on with some of the huge X3 mining farms in Vietnam. After they changed to "dynex solve" they had FGPA attacks for 1 week.....honestly I don't think they ever fixed the problem and the FPGAs are mining on the pools.here is the way I look at Dynex and both are losses1) You GPU miners are competing (once again age old story in crypto) with secret FPGAs and don't stand a change unless you sell into pumps.2) dynex solve is real but being used by the CCP and PLA to circumvent wester sanctions on semis now that they cant buy good chips.make what you will from this. know if 2 is true there's your exit liquidity. Take it a donate it to western arms production haha.

comments.author: scryptr
comments.created_time: March 01, 2023, 07:53:43 PMLast edit: March 14, 2023, 12:29:49 AM by scryptr
comments.body: DYNEXSOLVE IS THE ONLY CURRENT MINER FOR DYNEXCOIN (DNX) --DynexSolve will only run on CPUs and nVidia GPUs.  There are no FPGAs or ASICs that can mine DNX.  DNX is not a coin that uses a Cryptonight-based algorithm.If you have a bag of coins that were once called Dynex, they will likely not fit in a current Dynex wallet.  The information that you post about appears unrelated to DNX as it is mined and traded with the current Dynex softwares.       --scryptrEDIT: SRBMINER-MULTI RELEASED --Version 2.2.0 and later has support for mining Dynex Coin (DNX).  Version 2.2.1 was released yesterday, 12 MAR 23, version 2.2.0 released 5 days ago.  It works with my AMD 5700 XT cards.       --scryptr

comments.author: ZeeeN
comments.body: have any miner support amd card?

comments.author: VasilyS
comments.body: srbminer is universal miner for Nvidia, AMD and Intel. It has  significantly higher hashrate on dynexsolve algo compared to the official miner. More about Dynex coin mining here: www.cryptoprofi.info/?p=12852

comments.author: safar1980
comments.created_time: April 03, 2023, 01:15:18 PMLast edit: April 03, 2023, 01:30:35 PM by safar1980
comments.body: I found 1 more miner for this coin- OneZeroMiner. If simplemining.net added this miner to their software, then it is safe.https://simplemining.net/changelogFixed 8 GPUs limit Fixed an issue that could cause local minima 0 Added a more robust job downloader Added job3 file to packages Added POUW stats to logs Added decimal support for chips-memory option Removed intensity option as it's confusing and unnecessary Some minor bug fixes Added support for mmpOS. The HiveOS package should work on mmpOS toohttps://www.hashrate.no/miners/OneZeroMiner/changelogNEW DYNEX Miner - OneZeroMiner - MASSIVE HASHRATE INCREASE! More profitable than KASPA & NEXA nowhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5IsxFIcYs9wLink to developer's official GitHubhttps://minerstat.com/help/custom-miners-how-to-set-up-onezerominer
